text: the sons of5:34 Hattil. Agia, the sons of5:34 Pochereth-haz-zebaim, Ezra 2:57. Phacareth, the sons of Sabie, the sons of Sarothie, the sons of5:34 Another reading is, Misaias. Masias, the sons of Gas, the sons of Addus, the sons of Subas, the sons of Apherra, the sons of Barodis, the sons of Saphat, the sons of Allon.
